items.title: UK and France to send troops to Ukraine if peace deal agreed
items.title_zh: 如果和平协议同意,联合王国和法国将派部队前往乌克兰
items.summary: The UK and France have signed a declaration of intent on deploying troops in Ukraine if a peace deal is made with Russia, UK Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer has announced.
items.summary_zh: 如果与俄罗斯达成和平协议,联合王国和法国签署了关于在乌克兰部署部队的意向声明。

items.title: NY株式市場 ダウ終値として初 4万9000ドル台 AI関連への期待感

items.title: ブルージェイズ 岡本和真入団会見「すべて出し切りたい」
items.title_zh: Blue Jay's Kazuma Jersmoto's Club "我想切除一切"的俱乐部

items.summary_zh: 狗Shohei Otani 预计将记录300支全垒打

items.title: グリーンランドめぐり 米報道官 “軍も選択肢” 欧州はけん制

items.summary_zh: 格陵兰是什么?

items.title: ベネズエラ検察 マドゥーロ氏解放求める コロンビアは対話姿勢
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉检察官马杜罗要求哥伦比亚谈谈
items.summary: ベネズエラ 暫定大統領就任も混乱続く 野党側マチャド氏は批判
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统也批评马查德,

items.title: 中国 軍民両用の品目 日本向け輸出規制強化レアアースも対象か
items.title_zh: 中国军事和民事部门项目 日本是否也有资格获得出口管制强化稀土?
items.summary: マチャド氏 ベネズエラ暫定大統領を批判 “麻薬取り引き主導”
items.summary_zh: Machad先生批评委内瑞拉总统“打击毒品”,

items.title: BBC looks into the relationship between Cuba and Venezuela
items.title_zh: BBC调查古巴与委内瑞拉的关系.
items.summary: Cuba has held close relations with Nicolás Maduro's Venezuela. But with Maduro gone after a military operation in which Maduro was seized, Havana could be exposed if oil supply collapses.
items.summary_zh: 古巴与尼古拉斯·马杜罗的委内瑞拉保持了密切关系. 但随着马杜罗在一次被马杜罗夺取的军事行动后离去,如果石油供应崩溃,哈瓦那可能会被暴露.

items.title: 6日 島根と鳥取で震度5強の地震 同程度の規模の地震に注意を
items.title_zh: 6起地震 岛内和托托里5起地震

items.summary_zh: 股票价格 50,0002518日元 最大价值约2个月

items.title: 'It seems unjust to me' - views from Caracas on Maduro's seizure
items.title_zh: "这对我来说似乎是不公正的" - 加拉加斯关于马杜罗被扣押的看法
items.summary: BBC Mundo has spoken to Venezuelans in the country's capital about the latest US military operation and Nicolas Maduro's seizure.
items.summary_zh: BBC Mundo向委内瑞拉首都的委内瑞拉人表示,

items.title: 自民 国民の連立入りに期待 国民 前向き・慎重両論
items.title_zh: 巩固人民的自给自足期望
items.summary: 株価 5万2518円 終値として約2か月ぶり最高値更新
items.summary_zh: 股票价格 50,0002518日元 最大价值约2个月

items.title: US may intercept and seize oil tanker heading for Europe, reports say
items.title_zh: 美国可能拦截并扣押驶向欧洲的油轮,
items.summary: The US may act to seize a Russian-flagged oil tanker heading across the Atlantic to Europe, CBS News, the BBC's media partner in the US, reported.
items.summary_zh: 美国可能采取行动扣押一艘悬挂俄罗斯国旗的油轮,

items.title: Six dead and hundreds of flights cancelled as snow causes chaos across Europe
items.title_zh: 六起死亡和数百起航班被取消 雪造成整个欧洲的混乱
items.summary: Intense snowfall and icy weather conditions have caused widespread travel disruption across Europe, with six reported killed in weather-related incidents on the continent.
items.summary_zh: 强烈的降雪和冰冷的天气条件已使整个欧洲的出行受到广泛干扰,据报有6人在该大陆与天气有关的事件中丧生.

items.title: US Congressman Doug LaMalfa dies unexpectedly at 65
items.title_zh: 美国众议员道格·拉马尔法出人意料地死于65岁
items.summary: Doug LaMalfa, a Republican Congressman from California, has died unexpectedly at age 65, colleagues announced on Tuesday.
items.summary_zh: 来自加利福尼亚州的共和党众议员道格·拉马尔法(Doug LaMalfa)于周二宣布,65岁时意外去世.

items.title: The painful questions for Nato and the EU as Trump threatens Greenland
items.title_zh: 纳托和欧盟因特朗普威胁格陵兰而感到痛苦的问题
items.summary: Earlier today, the so-called Coalition of the Willing, largely made up of European leaders, met in Paris with envoys of US President Donald Trump, to try to make further progress on a sustainable peace deal for Ukraine.
items.summary_zh: 今天早些时候,主要由欧洲领导人组成的所谓"意志联盟"在巴黎与美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的特使会面,试图在乌克兰的可持续和平协议上取得进一步进展.

items.title: Israel's foreign minister on historic visit to Somaliland
items.title_zh: 以色列外交部长对索马里兰的历史性访问
items.summary: Israel's foreign minister has held talks with Somaliland's president on his first visit to the breakaway region since Israel controversially recognised it as an independent country.
items.summary_zh: 以色列外交部长在索马里兰总统首次访问分离地区时与他举行了会谈,因为以色列有争议地承认该地区是一个独立国家。

items.title: Swiss ski bar not inspected for five years before deadly fire, mayor says
items.title_zh: 镇长说,瑞士滑雪酒吧在起死回生前五年没有检查过
items.summary: The Swiss bar that was the scene of a fire which killed 40 people and injured 116 had not undergone safety checks for five years, authorities have said.
items.summary_zh: 当局说,当场发生大火,造成40人死亡和116人受伤的瑞士酒吧五年来没有接受过安全检查。

items.title: Iran anti-government protests spread to majority of provinces, videos show
items.title_zh: 伊朗反政府抗议活动蔓延到大多数省份,
items.summary: Protests have broken out in at least 17 of Iran's 31 provinces, presenting the largest challenge to the country's clerical establishment since 2022, a BBC Verify and BBC Persian analysis has found.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗31个省份中至少有17个爆发了抗议活动,这是自2022年以来该国文秘机构面临的最大挑战,BBC核查和BBC波斯分析都发现了.

items.title: European allies back Denmark over Trump's threat to annex Greenland
items.title_zh: 由于特朗普威胁吞并格陵兰,欧洲盟国支持丹麦.
items.summary: Six European allies have rallied to support Denmark following renewed insistence by the US that it must have control over Greenland.
items.summary_zh: 在美国再次坚持丹麦必须控制格陵兰之后,六个欧洲盟国联合起来支持丹麦。

items.title: Zelensky replaces Ukraine's powerful security service chief
items.title_zh: Zelensky取代乌克兰强大的安全部门负责人
items.summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky has reshuffled the leadership of Ukraine's Security Service (SBU), replacing influential Vasyl Malyuk and nominating Maj-Gen Yevhenii Khmara as acting head.
items.summary_zh: 沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基总统改组了乌克兰安全局的领导,取代了有影响力的瓦西尔·马柳克并提名叶韦尼·克马拉为代理局长。

items.title: Why does Trump want Greenland and what could it mean for Nato?
items.title_zh: 为什么特朗普想要格陵兰 纳托会有什么意义?
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has repeatedly said the US should take over Greenland, arguing that it would benefit his nation's security.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普再三表示,美国应该接管格陵兰,认为这将有利于他的国家的安全.

items.title: Venezuelan security forces detain journalists from foreign news organisations
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉安全部队拘留外国新闻组织的记者
items.summary: At least 14 members of the press were detained in Venezuela on Monday as they were covering the aftermath of the seizure of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro by US forces.
items.summary_zh: 至少有14名记者星期一在委内瑞拉被拘押,因为他们正在报道美军攻占委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯·马杜罗后的情况。

items.title: Children killed after drone hits home in Sudan, medics say
items.title_zh: 儿童在无人机击中苏丹家后被杀,
items.summary: At least 13 people have been killed - eight of them children - after a drone strike on a house in the Sudanese city of el-Obeid, says the Sudan Doctors' Network.
items.summary_zh: 苏丹医生网表示, 至少有13人在无人机袭击苏丹城市El-Obeid的一所房屋后被炸死, 其中8人是儿童。

items.title: Macron hosts Ukraine and allies to try to cement security guarantees
items.title_zh: Macron是乌克兰和盟国 试图巩固安全保障
items.summary: French President Emmanuel Macron is hosting Ukraine's leader Volodymyr Zelensky and other key allies of the country as efforts intensify to agree security guarantees for Kyiv in the event of a ceasefire with Russia.
items.summary_zh: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙正在接待乌克兰领导人沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基和该国其他重要盟友,以加紧努力,在与俄罗斯停火的情况下商定基辅的安全保障。

items.title: Dance music festival Tomorrowland to hold three-day event in Thailand
items.title_zh: 舞会音乐节 明天在泰国举办三天的活动
items.summary: Tomorrowland, the hugely popular European electronic dance music or EDM festival, will stage its first-ever full-fledged Asia edition in Thailand this December.
items.summary_zh: 明天是欧洲电子舞蹈音乐或EDM节,

items.title: Nvidia unveils self-driving car tech as it seeks to power more products with AI
items.title_zh: Nvidia推出自驾车技术,
items.summary: Nvidia has unveiled a new tech platform for self-driving cars as the world's leading chip-maker seeks more physical products to embed AI into.
items.summary_zh: 随着世界领先的芯片制造者寻求更多的实物产品来将AI嵌入其中,Nvidia为自驾汽车开启了一个新的技术平台.

items.title: Indian gang rape survivor back home after a week in hospital
items.title_zh: 印度轮奸幸存者在住院一周后回家
items.summary: The survivor of a gang rape in the northern Indian state of Haryana has been discharged from hospital a week after her horrific assault, a police official told the BBC.
items.summary_zh: 印度北部哈里亚纳邦的轮奸幸存者在遭到可怕袭击一周后出院,

items.title: Nestle issues global recall of some baby formula products over toxin fears
items.title_zh: 全球召回一些婴幼儿配方奶粉产品,而不是毒素恐惧
items.summary: Nestle has issued a global recall of some baby formula products over concerns they contain a toxin which can cause food poisoning.
items.summary_zh: Nestle发布全球召回一些婴儿配方奶粉产品,

items.title: Netflix pulls Chinese drama after Vietnam's outcry over disputed map
items.title_zh: Netflix在越南对争议地图的争吵后,
items.summary: Netflix has pulled a Chinese drama series from its Vietnam platform after Hanoi objected to an episode featuring a map with contested territorial claims in the South China Sea.
items.summary_zh: Netflix在其"越南"平台上拉出一出中国戏剧系列,此前河内反对一集以南海有争议地领土主张的地图为主角.

items.title: Which countries could be in Trump's sights after Venezuela?
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉之后哪些国家可能出现在特朗普的视线下?.
items.summary: US President Donald Trump's second term is being shaped by his foreign policy ambitions.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的第二个任期正被他的外交政策野心所塑造.

items.title: Selfies and smiles: South Korea seeks 'new phase' in ties with China
items.title_zh: 自我与微笑:韩国寻求与中国联系的"新阶段"
items.summary: South Korea's President Lee Jae Myung has called for a "new phase" in ties with China as he met its leader Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday.
items.summary_zh: 韩国总统李载明星期一在北京会见中国领导人习近平时,呼吁与中国建立"新阶段".

items.title: Long wait for justice leaves South African families in limbo
items.title_zh: 等待正义的漫长时间 让南非家庭陷入困境
items.summary: Jason Venter has been waiting for his mother's alleged killer to go on trial in South Africa for more than two years, living a life in limbo and hoping to get some closure after her death.
items.summary_zh: 贾森·文特尔一直等待他母亲被指控的凶手在南非受审两年多,在无缘无故地生活并希望能在她死后得到一些封口.

items.title: The 'magical' blue flower changing farmers' fortunes in India
items.title_zh: 印度的"神奇"蓝花 改变了农民的财富
items.summary: "Until a few years ago, the butterfly pea flower was just another climbing plant in my village," says Nilam Brahma who lives in Anthaigwlao, a village in the northeastern Indian state of Assam.
items.summary_zh: "直到几年前,蝴蝶豌豆花只是我村的另一个攀登植物",尼拉姆·布拉马(Nilam Brahma)说,他住在印度东北部阿萨姆邦的一个村庄Anthaigwlao.

items.title: Cuba defiant as it braces for post-Maduro era
items.title_zh: 古巴在马杜罗后时代的坚守中不屈
items.summary: After Venezuela, there is no nation in the Americas more affected by the events in Caracas than Cuba.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉之后,在美洲,受加拉加斯事件影响最大的国家莫过于古巴.

items.title: Watch: What it was like in the courtroom at Maduro's hearing
items.title_zh: 监视 : 马杜罗的听证会上法庭上的情况
items.summary: Nicolas Maduro, former president of Venezuela, made his first court appearance in New York City after his capture by US forces in Caracas on 3 January.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗于1月3日在加拉加斯被美军攻克后,首次出道于纽约市.

items.title: Video shows Maduro's arrival in US and journey into custody
items.title_zh: 视频显示马杜罗抵达美国 并被拘押
items.summary: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and his wife Cilia Flores have been placed in custody at a New York detention centre after he was captured during US strikes on Caracas.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗和妻子Cilia Flores在美国袭击加拉加斯时被俘后被拘押在纽约拘留中心.

items.title: Watch: 'I'm so happy' - Venezuelans in the US react to Maduro's capture
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉民众对马杜罗被捕的反应:
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says the US launched strikes on Venezuela and captured its President Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普说,美国对委内瑞拉发动了打击并俘虏了委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗.

items.title: Trump on Venezuela: 'We are going to run the country'
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉的特朗普:"我们要管理这个国家".
items.summary: President Donald Trump announced that the US will run Venezuela until a 'proper transition can take place.'
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布,

items.title: Explosions and smoke at La Guaira port
items.title_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港的爆炸和烟雾
items.summary: Port La Guaira is Caracas' main conduit to the Caribbean Sea, located in Miranda state.
items.summary_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港是加拉加斯通向加勒比海的主要通道,位于米兰达州.

items.title: Watch: Over 100 firefighters on the scene of Denver blaze
items.title_zh: 看:丹佛大火现场有100多名消防员
items.summary: The Colorado city of Denver was lit up by enormous fire on Friday evening, with over 100 firefighters on the scene to battle the blaze.
items.summary_zh: 科罗拉多州城市丹佛在星期五晚间被巨大的火灾所点燃,现场有超过100名消防员来与大火进行战斗.

items.title: Sailors saved from going over edge of huge dam
items.title_zh: 水手们从大坝上逃出
items.summary: Footage shows the moment four men were pulled to safety after spending hours dangling off the edge of a 40m (130ft) dam in South Africa.
items.summary_zh: 4名男子在南非40米(130英尺)水坝边上被拖走,

items.title: Watch: Moment 400-pound runaway prop injures Disney employee
items.title_zh: 看着:400磅跑道具 伤害了迪士尼员工
items.summary: Footage shows the moment a worker at Walt Disney World was injured after being hit by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop.
items.summary_zh: Footage显示一名在华特迪士尼世界(Walt Disney World)的工人被一辆400磅(180克)跑去的假巨石道具撞倒后受伤.

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.
